mapper.select: select i.in_num , c.client_actname , rm.raw_code , rm.raw_name , r.raw_order_count , s.stock_raw_count , rm.raw_price , raw_price * raw_order_count, i.in_date , e.emp_id , i.in_YN from in_material i join raw_order r on i.raw_order_num = r.raw_order_num join raw_material rm on rm.raw_code = r.raw_code join clients c on c.client_code = i.client_code join stock s on s.in_num = i.in_num join employees e on e.emp_id = i.emp_id
